description:
Ichigo, Rukia, Ririn, Noba, and Kurodo enter Jin Kariya`s mansion and come face to face with him and the other Bounts.  As Ichigo challenges Udagawa. Rukia rushes deeper into the mansion to rescue Uryu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chikara no Gekitotsu! Frido vs Zangetsu
Explosion de force ! Freed contre Zangetsu !
力の激突! フリードVS斬月
